content: this cute little zipper pouch measures approx 7 x 4 75 a perfect size for storing crochet hooks it uses the moss stitch which looks really polished but is a very simple stitch pattern so perfect for beginners i lined the inside of the pouch with plain white fabric lining and finished off with a zip **adjustments** * this pattern will work for any weight yarn and corresponding hook your finished pouch will just be a different size as an example you could use worsted weight yarn with a 5mm hook and follow the same pattern this will give you a larger pouch * you can also adjust the size by making a different number of chains in the foundation round any even number will work *please note any adjustments will alter the amount of yarn required * ---- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more 1 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe ---- © ned & mimi 2019 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted *
